<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Weighted">e30b55db8315d610b68c9640ceaad3b5</macroponent><name>stylized_text_1/css</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
 
	if (api.item.value.selected == true) { 
    return '* { font-family: "Honk"; color: red; margin: 0px; }';
  } else {
    return '* { font-family: "Honk";color: black; margin: 0px; }';
  }


}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-22 12:55:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>230b55db8315d610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_1/css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drama" source="x_pamtn_drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_230b55db8315d610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-22 21:10:16</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
